title: Migrating from OpenShift Service Mesh 2.6
subtitle: Migrating from OpenShift Service Mesh 2.6 to 3

abstract.para: This document provides important information on difference between Service Mesh 2.6 and Service Mesh 3, including a new operator, new resources, and changes to integrations such as OpenShift Observability and Kiali. It also provides information on migrating from OpenShift Service Mesh 2.6 to OpenShift Service Mesh 3.
